org.jooby.json

Class Gzon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.json.Gzon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Jooby.Module 

    public class Gzon
extends Object
implements Jooby.Module
    JSON support via Gson library.

    exposes

    • A Gson
    • A Parser
    • A Renderer

    usage

     {
   use(new Gzon());

   // sending
   get("/my-api", req  -> new MyObject());

   // receiving a json body
   post("/my-api", req  -> {
     MyObject obj = req.body(MyObject.class);
     return obj;
   });

   // direct access to Gson
   get("/access", req  -> {
     Gson gson = req.require(Gson.class);
     // ...
   });
 }

    configuration

    If you need a special setting or configuration for your Gson: 

     {
   use(new Gzon().doWith(builder  -> {
     builder.setPrettyPrint();
     // ...
   });
 }
    Since:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    edgar

      • configure

        public void configure(Env env,
                      com.typesafe.config.Config config,
                      com.google.inject.Binder binder)
        Description copied from interface: Jooby.Module
        Configure and produces bindings for the underlying application. A module can optimize or customize a service by checking current the application env and/or the current application properties available from Config.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface  Jooby.Module
        Parameters:
        env - The current application's env. Not null.
        config - The current config object. Not null.
        binder - A guice binder. Not null.

      • raw

        public Gzon raw()
        Add support raw string json responses: 
        
 {
   get("/raw", () -> {
     return "{\"raw\": \"json\"}";
   });
 }
        Returns:
        This module.
